name: Rounded VK
description: Makes avatars and group logos rounded.
css:
@-moz-document domain(vk.com) {
	.im_photo_holder img,
	img.im_user_holder,
	.page_list_module .thumb img,
	.published_by_photo img,
	.reply_image img,
	#pad_audio_friends_list img,
	.dialogs_photo>a>img,
	#friends_list .friends_photo_img,
	.feedback_row_photo img,
	.ava img,
	.feedback_group_photo img,
	.dialogs_msg_body img, .dialogs_inline_author img,
	.dialogs_inline_chatter img,
	.search_item_img,
	.post_image img,
	img.im_log_author_chat_thumb,
	.groups_row_img,
	a.reply_form_image,
	.dialogs_photo img
	{
	    border-radius: 100% !important;
	}

        #profile_photo_link img{
            border-radius: 100px !important;
        }
}
